attributes.review: I honestly want to know everything about what Trump was doing for the election but this app just kept doing some weird stuff when I came to my life like it microwaved my car it killed my entire family and now I’m out on the streets alone just because of this app. Before I kill my parents it absolutely trashed my house so I had to clean it while it was hitting me it was so terrible then when I went to go ask my grandmother for help and hung up the phone so II couldn’t speak to her and then it deleted her number I don’t know that by heart so unfortunately I just have to say that I can’t use this as a one star on my porch I’m so sorry but this app is really bad and this Orange Trump person really needs to fix his app it’s so bad sensible Trump supporter couldn’t get anything out of this but unfortunately for me I got the worst part of it I want to try to call someone for help they just hung up the phone like it was some type of ritual or something I really want to know what’s going on but I can’t even get in the app every time I try to get in it I just get punched in the face and when I wake up I’m covered in blood it’s not my blood it’s never my blood and I don’t know what to do I  dont know what’s going on but please call someone and don’t download this app it’s terrible
